page.title: 14Newcomers to Eccleston
page.content: "My family moved into Eccleston because of my dad's job; it is near to where he works. Before we came to Eccleston we used to live in Northampton, where my dad was an engineer and my mum did not go out to work. Now my dad is a manufacturing director and my mum is a part-time teacher and social worker. I have no grandparents in this area."-Kathryn "I am called Stephen, and I have a brother who is three years younger. We used to live in a village in Warwickshire. We came to Eccleston because my dad got a new job. We chose to live in Eccleston because it is nice and peaceful. My mum teaches Italian and French part-time in a secondary school, and my dad is headmaster of a sixth-form college."
